system.description:
The druid magically pulls existing weather conditions from a nearby area to their location.

Effects:

  • The druid does not control the weather, but can summon an existing condition to their location.
  • At levels 12-15, the spell pulls weather from up to 5 miles away.
  • Each level beyond 15th adds 1 extra mile to the range (e.g., a 20th-level druid can summon weather from 10 miles away).
  • Only druids of 25th level or higher may summon severe weather (hurricanes, blizzards, etc.).
